items.title: Kipnis may move to center field upon return
items.summary: When Jason Kipnis heard that manager Terry Francona wanted to speak to him on Monday, the Indians second baseman quickly realized what the conversation might be about. With Bradley Zimmer sidelined with a fractured bone in his left hand, maybe Kipnis was going to be asked to play the outfield.
items.content: When Jason Kipnis heard that manager Terry Francona wanted to speak to him on Monday, the Indians second baseman quickly realized what the conversation might be about. With Bradley Zimmer sidelined with a fractured bone in his left hand, maybe Kipnis was going to be asked to play the outfield.

alternate.title: Kipnis may move to center field upon return
